attributes.action: limit the number of petitions any one person can create to a maximum of six per annum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some people create petition after petition,and to give credibility to these petitions,if they had to eke out their allotment then more thought would go into each petition

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
